item.title: Treasury bonds aren’t the safe haven they’ve been in the past — and taxpayers will pay a price
item.description: The U.S. government faces hundreds of billions of dollars in additional interest payments

item.title: OPEC+ meets this weekend at a precarious time for crude oil. Here’s what’s at stake.
item.description: The market has a lot to contend with as OPEC+ considers a second round of production hikes this weekend, against an economic and geopolitical backdrop...

item.title: 401(k) millionaires reach an all-time high. Here’s the No. 1 thing most Gen Xers and boomers did to get there.
item.description: From the dot-com crash to reaching millionaire status, these savers were in the market for the long haul.

item.title: 10-year Treasury tumbles to early April low as weak jobs report raises chances of a half-point Fed rate cut
item.description: Longer-term Treasury yields look like a safety play for the first time since April’s market shock.

item.title: Why AMD’s stock just saw one of the worst drops in the S&P 500 on Friday
item.description: AMD offers a GPU alternative to Nvidia, but it seems like hyperscalers are paying more attention to custom chips made by Broadcom.
